description:
Lag and Niche are to deliver a small package to a town in Yodaka named Silencio, sent by the Bee-Hive master Largo Lloyd himself. The recipient is a woman who once worked as a Letter Bee, Elena Bran.  However unlike a usual delivery, this time Lag is assigned with him a guide named Darwin...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: テガミバチとディンゴ
